name: Ocean Getaway
description:
This is my 2D shooter project.

I have made the below changes.

1. Reskinned the background, environmental pieces, menus,  payer, and all  enemies to be ocean themed 

2. Created my own music for the game

3. Created 3 unique levels 

4. New invisible obstacles in level 3

Game Created by Christie Pratt

Music Created by Christie Pratt using Music Maker JAM

Player and Enemy images by Graphics RF
